articles.description: Wednesday was a bad day for Big Oil, or a good one, depending on your point of view.
articles.content:
(Bloomberg Opinion) -- Wednesday was a bad day for Big Oil, or a good one, depending on your point of view. Theyre going to have to clean up their acts a lot faster than they were planning.
Three of… [+3621 chars]
